member.name: T:Drelanium.BDD.BaseBindingClass
member.summary:
BaseClass for StepDefinition and Hooks SpecFlow classes.
Apply on the inherited classes to make it visible for SpecFlow.
Use | | attributes for StepDefinition methods.
Use | for TestRun SetUp and TearDowns.
Use | for Feature SetUp and TearDowns.
Use | for Scenario SetUp and TearDowns.
Use | for ScenarioBlock SetUp and TearDowns.
Use | for Step SetUp and TearDowns.
